nodes.text: Pinani was the widow of Quintama, a captain of the Melida Liberation Force. She was the daughter of Bicha and Tiraca, supposedly great heroes. She died in an attack on the town of Bin that was fought to avenge the Twenty-First Battle of Zehava. Renei and Wunana were her children. They perished in the Twenty-Second Battle of Zehava. Pinani's holographic memorial was found by Obi-Wan Kenobi and Qui-Gon Jinn in the Hall of Evidence during their mission to Melida/Daan.
